Download Daemon tools. 

http://www.daemon-tools.cc/dtcc/portal/download.php?mode=ViewCategory&catid=5

Install it. Then right klick on Daemon tools in the right corner of the screen. Choose "Virtual CD/DvD-ROM" and then "Device 0: [ G:] No media" and then "Mount image". Now just find the .iso file and press open. :D
